title: With Win Over Ghana, U.S. Is Off On The Right Foot In Brazil
teaser: On Monday night, the U.S. soccer team accomplished a feat it failed to achieve in the past two World Cups: beat Ghana. With a 2-1 victory, the Americans position themselves well for the games to come.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
